name: OumanThermostatControl
0:
”Alexa, set living room to 22 degrees.”
”Alexa, make living room warmer.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature in living room?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Skills are used to Control Ouman electric floor heating thermostats. The main use cases are voice control, grouping of thermostats and routines via Alexa. 

Ouman thermostat is white label “platform” thermostat, which will be branded for Ouman customers. Ouman has made thermostat control application for Android and iOS phone.

The following commands will be provided for thermostats: 
“Alexa, discover devices”
“Alexa change thermostat to HEAT”
“Alexa change thermostat to ECO”
“Alexa change thermostat to AUTO”
“Alexa set thermostat to 22 degrees”
“Alexa make thermostat warmer”
“Alexa increase thermostat temperature by 2 degrees”
“Alexa make thermostat cooler”
“Alexa reduce thermostat temperature by 2 degrees”
“Alexa, what is thermostat set to”
“Alexa, what is the temperature in thermostat”
